description_card.title: Description
description_card.description: I am a passionate <0>FRONT-END</0> programmer with a strong experience in designing and developing various types of web projects. I am motivated to create extraordinary user experiences using the <0>latest technologies and innovative designs</0>.<1></1><1></1> My passion for running has taught me the importance of <0>perseverance and discipline</0>, which I also apply in my work. <1></1> I enjoy collaborating with other professionals in the industry to create <0>high-quality digital products that meet the needs of clients</0>.
